pages.text: This is the spawn in the Building World

pages.title: Building World
pages.text: $(li)PVP disabled$(li)Claims enabled$(li)Mining World Portals at Spawn

pages.title: Claiming
pages.text: Wander around till you find your place to build.$(br2)Press 'M' to open the worldmap.$(br2)Hold right-click and select the area you want to claim.$(br2)Click 'Claim Selected'$(br2)You can buy more chunks from a villager trader.
